public class hd
extends Object
A hex-dump program vaguely similar to Unix od.

hd()

dump(OutputStream, InputStream)
Reads the bytes in the input stream and produces a hex dump on the output stream
main(String[])
Arguments to this class are a list of file names.
toHex(int, int)
Converts the integer n into zero-leading string length chars long.

hd 
 public hd()

main 
 public static void main(String a[])
Arguments to this class are a list of file names. Produces a hex dump to the standard output

dump 
 public static void dump(OutputStream os,
                         InputStream is) throws IOException
Reads the bytes in the input stream and produces a hex dump on the output stream

toHex 
 public static String toHex(int n,
                            int length)
Converts the integer n into zero-leading string length chars long. If it doesn't fit, you get the low bits.
